description: Lists all Recovery Instances or multiple Recovery Instances by ID.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: A set of filters by which to return Recovery Instances. recoveryInstanceIDs (list) --- An array of Recovery Instance IDs that should be returned. An empty array means all Recovery Instances. (string) --- sourceServerIDs (list) --- An array of Source Server IDs for which associated Recovery Instances should be returned. (string) ---

nested_params.name: recoveryInstanceIDs
nested_params.description: An array of Recovery Instance IDs that should be returned. An empty array means all Recovery Instances.

nested_params.name: sourceServerIDs
nested_params.description: An array of Source Server IDs for which associated Recovery Instances should be returned.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: An array of Recovery Instances.

nested_items.name: agentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the DRS agent installed on the recovery instance.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Recovery Instance.

nested_items.name: dataReplicationInfo
nested_items.description: The Data Replication Info of the Recovery Instance.

nested_items.name: dataReplicationError
nested_items.description: Information about Data Replication.

nested_items.name: error
nested_items.description: Error in data replication.

nested_items.name: rawError
nested_items.description: Error in data replication.

nested_items.name: dataReplicationInitiation
nested_items.description: Information about whether the data replication has been initiated.

nested_items.name: startDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time of the current attempt to initiate data replication.

nested_items.name: steps
nested_items.description: The steps of the current attempt to initiate data replication.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the step.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the step.

nested_items.name: dataReplicationState
nested_items.description: The state of the data replication.

nested_items.name: etaDateTime
nested_items.description: An estimate of when the data replication will be completed.

nested_items.name: lagDuration
nested_items.description: Data replication lag duration.

nested_items.name: replicatedDisks
nested_items.description: The disks that should be replicated.

nested_items.name: backloggedStorageBytes
nested_items.description: The size of the replication backlog in bytes.

nested_items.name: deviceName
nested_items.description: The name of the device.

nested_items.name: replicatedStorageBytes
nested_items.description: The amount of data replicated so far in bytes.

nested_items.name: rescannedStorageBytes
nested_items.description: The amount of data to be rescanned in bytes.

nested_items.name: totalStorageBytes
nested_items.description: The total amount of data to be replicated in bytes.

nested_items.name: stagingAvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: AWS Availability zone into which data is being replicated.

nested_items.name: stagingOutpostArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the staging Outpost.

nested_items.name: ec2InstanceID
nested_items.description: The EC2 instance ID of the Recovery Instance.

nested_items.name: ec2InstanceState
nested_items.description: The state of the EC2 instance for this Recovery Instance.

nested_items.name: agentLastSeenByServiceDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the agent on the Recovery Instance was last seen by the service.

nested_items.name: elapsedReplicationDuration
nested_items.description: The amount of time that the Recovery Instance has been replicating for.

nested_items.name: failbackClientID
nested_items.description: The ID of the failback client that this Recovery Instance is associated with.

nested_items.name: failbackClientLastSeenByServiceDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the failback client was last seen by the service.

nested_items.name: failbackInitiationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the failback initiation started.

nested_items.name: failbackJobID
nested_items.description: The Job ID of the last failback log for this Recovery Instance.

nested_items.name: failbackLaunchType
nested_items.description: The launch type (Recovery / Drill) of the last launch for the failback replication of this recovery instance.

nested_items.name: failbackToOriginalServer
nested_items.description: Whether we are failing back to the original Source Server for this Recovery Instance.

nested_items.name: firstByteDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time of the first byte that was replicated from the Recovery Instance.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the failback process that this Recovery Instance is in.

nested_items.name: isDrill
nested_items.description: Whether this Recovery Instance was created for a drill or for an actual Recovery event.

nested_items.name: jobID
nested_items.description: The ID of the Job that created the Recovery Instance.

nested_items.name: originAvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: AWS availability zone associated with the recovery instance.

nested_items.name: originEnvironment
nested_items.description: of the instance that the recovery instance originated from.

nested_items.name: pointInTimeSnapshotDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time of the Point in Time (PIT) snapshot that this Recovery Instance was launched from.

nested_items.name: recoveryInstanceID
nested_items.description: The ID of the Recovery Instance.

nested_items.name: recoveryInstanceProperties
nested_items.description: Properties of the Recovery Instance machine.

nested_items.name: cpus
nested_items.description: An array of CPUs.

nested_items.name: cores
nested_items.description: The number of CPU cores.

nested_items.name: modelName
nested_items.description: The model name of the CPU.

nested_items.name: disks
nested_items.description: An array of disks.

nested_items.name: bytes
nested_items.description: The amount of storage on the disk in bytes.

nested_items.name: ebsVolumeID
nested_items.description: The EBS Volume ID of this disk.

nested_items.name: internalDeviceName
nested_items.description: The internal device name of this disk. This is the name that is visible on the machine itself and not from the EC2 console.

nested_items.name: identificationHints
nested_items.description: Hints used to uniquely identify a machine.

nested_items.name: awsInstanceID
nested_items.description: AWS Instance ID identification hint.

nested_items.name: fqdn
nested_items.description: Fully Qualified Domain Name identification hint.

nested_items.name: hostname
nested_items.description: Hostname identification hint.

nested_items.name: vmWareUuid
nested_items.description: vCenter VM path identification hint.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the Recovery Instance properties were last updated on.

nested_items.name: networkInterfaces
nested_items.description: An array of network interfaces.

nested_items.name: ips
nested_items.description: Network interface IPs.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: isPrimary
nested_items.description: Whether this is the primary network interface.

nested_items.name: macAddress
nested_items.description: The MAC address of the network interface.

nested_items.name: fullString
nested_items.description: The long name of the Operating System.

nested_items.name: ramBytes
nested_items.description: The amount of RAM in bytes.

nested_items.name: sourceOutpostArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the source Outpost.

nested_items.name: sourceServerID
nested_items.description: The Source Server ID that this Recovery Instance is associated with.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token of the next Recovery Instance to retrieve.
